sentences.en: "And now, without further ado, let me introduce our benefactor."
sentences.cn: “下面，闲话少说，让我来介绍一下我们的赞助人。”

sentences.en: An hour later there was a great ado on the Aventine Hill.
sentences.cn: 一小时之后,阿文廷山上发生了一场大乱子.

sentences.en: General data access engine as an extension of ADO. NET.
sentences.cn: 这是个通用数据访问引擎,是对ADO. NET的扩展.

sentences.en: He had much ado in finding out his lodging.
sentences.cn: 他费尽力气才找到住处.

sentences.en: He paid up without any more ado.
I made no more ado , but knocked him on the head.
sentences.cn: 我毫不客气地在他的脑袋上打了一下.

sentences.en: It's really you that I wish to see, I came out with no more ado.
sentences.cn: 我要见的实际是你, 因此我干脆到这儿来了.

sentences.en: It'struck her as exceedingly important, and without ado she went to look for her purse.
sentences.cn: 她想到这问题非常重要, 就立刻去找她的钱包.

sentences.en: My sister always makes much ado about nothing.
sentences.cn: 我的妹妹老是无事自扰.

sentences.en: So without further ado, I’ll now ask Mr Davis to open the debate.
sentences.cn: 不再多说了，现在我请戴维斯先生开始辩论。

sentences.en: So, without more ado, let me introduce tonight's guests.
sentences.cn: 所以, 我就不再啰嗦了, 还是介绍一下今晚的客人吧.

sentences.en: The servants likewise used me saucily, and had much ado to keep their hands off me.
sentences.cn: 有几个仆人对我很无礼,要他们的手不碰我是很难的.

sentences.en: The whole controversy is for too much ado about nothing.
sentences.cn: 这场争论完全是无事生非.

sentences.en: Upon this the goat without any more ado leaped in.
We need not make so much ado about it.
sentences.cn: 我们不必为此事而如此地麻烦.

sentences.en: Without much ado just start typing or writing down what type of life you really want to live.
sentences.cn: 无需太多忙乱，只要开始键入或写下你真正想过的是什么类型的生活。

phrases.tran_cn: 没有再费周折；立即；干脆痛快

trans.tran_cn: 无谓的忙乱，毫不耽搁，干脆，立即
